task.title: Using the org.dita4publishers.utils
task.shortdesc: The org.dita4publishers.utils is a small experimental utility intented to simplify the development of custimization plugins

context.p: This tutorial assumes you already have a html mockup developped, with all css and javascript coded.

step.cmd: Using the command line, at the root of the DITA-OT installation, run ant -f plugins/org.dita4publishers.utils
step.stepresult:
You will be prompted to create a new plugin:
[echo] [echo] Welcome to the Dita for publishers Utility [echo] [echo] What do you want to do today? [echo] [echo] 1. Create a HTML5 customization plugin (xsl, css, javascript customization) [echo] 0. Cancel [echo] [echo] [input] Your choice? [0]
